resources.string: The Protect Brazil is an initiative of UNICEF and the Human Rights Secretariat of the Ministry of Justice and Citizenship. The application was launched in 2013 as a result of the convergence agenda, a coordinating body that brings together various organizations focused on promoting the rights of children and adolescents during mega events. \n\nThe creation of the application was an initiative of UNICEF, Ilhasoft, Cedeca-BA and ABMP with the accession of the federal government afterwards. In 2016, a new version was released, expanding the functionality and making integration with Disque 100, the main complaint channel of human rights violations in the country.
